alert.note: Alert for Catahoula; Franklin (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 11 at 11:38AM CDT until May 11 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Catahoula Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Southern Franklin Parish in northeastern Louisiana... * Until 100 PM CDT. * At 1137 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Columbia to near Rosefield to 7 miles north of Jena, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Rosefield around 1145 AM CDT. Aimwell and Sherwood around 1150 AM CDT. Enterprise and Manifest around 1155 AM CDT. Harrisonburg and Jigger around 1205 PM CDT. Wallace Ridge around 1210 PM CDT. Wisner and Sicily Island around 1215 PM CDT. Lee Bayou around 1230 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CDT for northeastern Louisiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
